ValidationRule.description: Message to Round State Tax & State Stamping Fee if State is IL
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Received"), (Opportunity__r.Account.ShippingState = 'Illinois'),
AND(OR( State_Tax__c <> ROUND (State_Tax__c , 0 ), State_Stamping_Fee__c <> ROUND (State_Stamping_Fee__c , 0 )),
NOT(OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Received', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Locked', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Open', RecordType.DeveloperName ='HB_Open', RecordType.DeveloperName ='H_B_Received' ))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please round State Tax and State Stamping Fee for Illinois. Note: You may need to uncheck Auto-Calculate.
